short_description: EIA form 930 contains operational data of the american electricity grid including demand, demand forecast and generation by balancing authority.
EIA form 923 contains monthly data on power generation in US, including net generation, fuel receipts and retail sales by state.
Bank of Italy table 20224 contains data on loan origination, excluding bad loans, by region and sector in Italy
Bank of Italy table, data on bad loan amounts, by region and sector in Italy
Bank of Italy data on loan origination, by NACE classification and sector, Italy level only
EIA Annual Energy Outlook provides projection of future energy variables including prices,load and generation based on 11 scenarios. The forecast method is open-source
Capacity data aggregated from EIA plant-level dataset, infering capacity from nameplate capacity of all operating plants within each balancing authority.
hourly continuous emissions monitoring system data. CO2,SO2,NOx emissions, plant level granularity.
hourly set of metrics on largest uniswap stablecoin pools, includes prices and aggregated net per-token swaps at all fee tiers
availability: Ask-to be added to BRC dataset
